text: Eduard Meron (also Edward Maron; אדוארד מרון; born 1938) is an Israeli former Olympic weightlifter. He was born in Haifa, Israel. Meron is an Arab-Israeli. Meron said in 2012 that he was certain that Israeli Olympic representation, which has seen few Arabs, is determined only according to criteria: "There’s a minimum you have to meet, and if Arab athletes didn’t meet the minimum, that means that they weren’t good enough." ==Weightlifting career== Meron competed for Israel at the 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome, in Weightlifting--Men's Bantamweight. He came in 18th, after lifting a total of 270 kg in his best lifts in military press, snatch, and clean & jerk. When he competed in the Olympics he was 5-4.5 (164 cm) tall, and weighed 123 lbs (56 kg).
